SELECT M.MENU_CD, M.SYSTEM_BIT, M.MENU_NM , M.LEVEL, M.SORT, M.PROG_CD, C.DL_CD_NM AS PROGRAM_GROUP_NM , P.PROG_CD, P.PROG_NM, M.USE_YN, M.REMARK, M.PARENT_MENU_CD, M.MENU_CD AS OLD_MENU_CD , COALESCE((SELECT S.MENU_NM from BMS_MENU_MST S WHERE S.MENU_CD = M.PARENT_MENU_CD), 'Parent Category') AS PARENT_MENU_NM FROM BMS_MENU_MST M LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_PROG_MST P ON M.PROG_CD = P.PROG_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO C ON C.DL_CD = P.PROG_GRP_CD AND C.CO_CD = 'PROG_GRP_CD'
AND M.MENU_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{CONTENT}, '%')
AND M.MENU_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{CONTENT}, '%')
AND M.PARENT_MENU_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{CONTENT}, '%')
AND M.LEVEL IS NOT NULL
AND M.LEVEL = #{CONTENT}
ORDER BY M.MENU_CD, M.SORT
